00011 class SockBuf : public std::streambuf, public BaseSocket {
00012 public:
00013     static const int BUFSIZE=BUFSIZ;
00014 
00015     SockBuf()                                     : BaseSocket() { __initBuf(); }
00017     SockBuf(const Socket &s)                      : BaseSocket(s) { __initBuf(); }
00019     SockBuf(type t, protocol prot=ipproto_ip) : BaseSocket(t, prot) { __initBuf(); } 
00021     SockBuf(int sd)                               : BaseSocket(sd) { __initBuf(); }
00022     
00024     void close();
00026     ~SockBuf();
00027 
00028 protected:
00029     virtual int overflow(int c = EOF);
00030     virtual int underflow();
00031     virtual int sync();
00032 
00033 private:
00034     char _inBuf[BUFSIZE], _outBuf[BUFSIZE];

00040 class SockStream : public std::iostream {
00041 public:
00042     SockStream()                    : std::iostream(new SockBuf()) { exceptions(badbit); }
00044     SockStream(SockBuf &s)          : std::iostream(&s) { exceptions(badbit); }
00046     SockStream(const Socket &s)     : std::iostream(new SockBuf(s)) { exceptions(badbit); }
00048     SockStream(const SockStream &s) : std::iostream(s.sockbuf()) { exceptions(badbit); }
00050     SockStream(type t, protocol prot=ipproto_ip) 
00051                                     : std::iostream(new SockBuf(t,prot)) { exceptions(badbit); }
00052  
00054     SockBuf* sockbuf() const { return (SockBuf*)rdbuf(); }
00056     SockBuf* operator->()  { return sockbuf(); }
00057 };

00060 std::ostream &crlf (std::ostream &s)
00061 {
00062     return s << "\r\n";
00063 }
